# File lib/gherkin/parser/parser.rb, line 34
      def event(ev, line)
        machine.event(ev, line) do |state, expected|
          if @raise_on_error
            raise ParseError.new(state, ev, expected, line)
          else
            @listener.syntax_error(state, ev, expected, line)
            return false
          end
        end
        true
      end
